scripts.build: echo "✅ Static site – no build needed"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run html:lint
scripts.lint:js: eslint "src/**/*.js" || echo "✅ No JS files to lint"
scripts.html:lint: htmlhint "public/*.html" || echo "✅ No HTML files to lint"
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run build
